reviewText: This is the very best of all the Hooters girls, and I think they're the sexiest of any group.  They have beautiful faces and stunning figures. They're trained to be personable in their jobs, and that comes through.  They're not rail-thin like the supermodels.  They're not the airbrushed types like Playboy.  They don't come across phony and stiff like those from the traditional pageants.  Or sleazy like those from porno.  I'm just really impressed with the Hooters girls, and every year it gets better.  Nope, I don't have any connection to Hooters.  Just a fan.
